introducing.title: Hi I'm Felix Web Developer
introducing.description: I enjoy developing, creating & solving problems

about.title: About Me
about.description: Over the recent years I've developed different projects in order to improve my skills as a Frontend Developer, collab with teammates & more. Right now I'm offerring my skills on development to solve your needs

fbo.title: FBO Movies
fbo.short_description: FBO Movies is an HBO Max clone developed in order to enhance my skills with TypeScript & learn more about Data Fetching on NextJS.
fbo.description: In order to develop this project I used the TMDB API or The Movie Database API where I was able to get different data about movies & TV Series such as release date, description & vertically or horizontal images. This app was developed by using NextJS in order to add sever side rendering & make different pages that show categories of movies & series.
fbo.author: Author:

petvet.title: petvet
petvet.short_description: Veterinarian Marianella Tovar's Landing Page. Was created in order to give fast access to her clients for get in touch with her, offer her services & much more. The tools implemented for the development of this web site were: NextJS, TailwindCSS & of course JavaScript!
petvet.description: In order to start developing this project the Veterinarian & I analized the advantages that a landing page can offer to her. Then we took care about the different areas the Vet wanted to show to her clients & finally I started the development of this web by using NextJS so I can make this web more complex in the future.
petvet.author: Author:

bambina.title: bambina
bambina.short_description: Schedule Web App for Bambina Studio. Bambina is a Spa that needed to schedule their dates. In order to create this app I collab with my teammate Shakira Contreras. The architecture of the app was developed by her while I developed the interactivity.
bambina.description: Since this was my first project using Vue, I was responsible for studying the fundamentals of this framework in order to comprehend the Web App  & finally add the interactivity. Warning: Due to this is a private App is not possible to show the github link neither the live web.
bambina.author: Author:

figram.title: figram
figram.short_description:
Login credentials: 'user: miduga@gmail.com' 'password: test'. 
 Figram is a mobile SPA instagram clone created in order to learn tools like ReactJs, styled components, API consumption with GraphQL & Vite.
figram.description: In order to develop this project it was used a prebuild API made by Platzi team. this app also has functionalities: like photos, sign in, log in, log out, watch favorite photos & select the pet by category.
figram.author: Author:

figuitars.title: Figuitars
figuitars.short_description:
Login credentials: 'password: asdf'. 
 Figuitars is an E-commerce web template developed in shopify's platform in order to learn Liquid programming language & use it with HTML, CSS & JavaScript for development/customizing online stores.
figuitars.description: This project was developed with Liquid Programming Language combined with HTML, CSS & Javascript. My personal goal with this project is to show my passion about music & my favorite musical instrument: The Guitar
figuitars.author: Author:

mystarwars.title: My Star Wars
mystarwars.short_description: Star Wars is one of my favorite sagas. What is better than practice your skills while you do something that you like?. This is one of my first projects developed by using HTML, SASS, Vanila JavaScript & Weboack.
mystarwars.description: The API used for the development of this project was SWAPI, the star wars API so I could get information from characters, planets, films, vehicles & starships. I used Webpack as a module bundler & hydrated the index.html file by using Vanila JS like creating a way to simulate the React behavior. Finally I used Sass preprocessor to add the styles & make the development faster.
mystarwars.author: Author:

fitimer.title: Fitimer
fitimer.short_description: Fitimer it's a timer developed by using HTML, SASS & JavaScript created in order to improve my skills with JavaScript.
fitimer.description: In order to develop this project I focused on the timer functionality by using the JavaScript Object 'Date'. Then I created the functionality for every single button
fitimer.author: Author:

paintit.title: Paint It
paintit.short_description: Paint It is my first project developed by using HTML, CSS & JavaScript, then I upgrade it with other techologies like SASS & Webpack.
paintit.description: In order to develop this project I used the JavaScript canvas, DOM references & event management for functionalities.
paintit.author: Author:

contact.description: Hi! If you want I help you with your Web Site feel free to text me!, so please

footer.title: Do you want to know more about me?
footer.description: I have a BE in Telecommunications Engineering & currently I'm an university professor, My passion for IT has made me explore into different areas. Until now my favorite one is Web Development.
footer.dataDescription: I Live in Valencia, Carabobo, Venezuela. My E-Mail: felixreyna48@gmail.com
